I seek to ensure trustworthy and confidential sensing-based computation in user-device interactions, critical infrastructures, and emerging technologies, with a focus on the hardware-software interfaces. I received my PhD degree from the University of Michigan, EECS where I worked with my PhD advisor Kevin Fu (Fellow of IEEE, ACM, AAAS). I completed my undergraduate study at Zhejiang University, where I worked with Wenyuan Xu (Fellow of IEEE) and Xiaoyu Ji.
